name: Dino-Mind Game Jam Entry
description:
Welcome to my first Game Jam entry! There are a lot of problems with this game and I am currently studying for two exams so I rushed this project. I am still happy that I came out with a game, even though it is definitely not the best I can do.  Enjoy!

Story: You are a dino that is given a brain when, uh oh! DISASTER. Find the brain pieces and complete your new brain. 

Theme: Mind Control

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, r to die and spawn back at the spawn platform

Credits: I made everything :)
